bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ASSISTING LANGUAGE LEARNING

abstract.p: Speech data from the operation of a speech recognition application is recorded over the course of one or more language learning sessions. The operation of the speech recognition application during each language learning sessions corresponds to a user speaking, and the speech recognition application generating text data. The text data may a recognition of what the user spoke. The speech data may comprise the text data, and confidence values that are an indication of an accuracy of the recognition. The speech data from each language learning session may be analyzed to determine an overall performance level of the user.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for programmatically evaluating and aiding a person learning a new language

abstract.p: Speech data from the operation of a speech recognition application is recorded over the course of one or more language learning sessions. The operation of the speech recognition application during each language learning sessions corresponds to a user speaking, and the speech recognition application generating text data. The text data may correspond to a recognition of what the user spoke. The speech data may comprise the text data, and confidence values that are an indication of an accuracy of the recognition. The speech data from each language learning session may be analyzed to determine an overall performance level of the user.

abstract.p: Speech data from the operation of a speech recognition application is recorded over the course of one or more language learning sessions. The operation of the speech recognition application during each language learning sessions corresponds to a user speaking, and the speech recognition application generating text data. The text data may a recognition of what the user spoke. The speech data may comprise the text data, and confidence values that are an indication of an accuracy of the recognition. The speech data from each language learning session may be analyzed to determine an overall performance level of the user.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ASSISTING LANGUAGE LEARNING
SYSTÈME ET PROCÉDÉ FACILITANT L'APPRENTISSAGE DES LANGUES

abstract.p: Speech data from the operation of a speech recognition application is recorded over the course of one or more language learning sessions. The operation of the speech recognition application during each language learning sessions corresponds to a user speaking, and the speech recognition application generating text data. The text data may a recognition of what the user spoke. The speech data may comprise the text data, and confidence values that are an indication of an accuracy of the recognition. The speech data from each language learning session may be analyzed to determine an overall performance level of the user.

Des données vocales provenant du fonctionnement d'une application de reconnaissance vocale sont enregistrées au cours d'une ou de plusieurs sessions d'apprentissage des langues. L'application de reconnaissance vocale fonctionne, pendant chacune desdites sessions, lorsqu'un locuteur parle, et produit des données de texte. Les données de texte correspondent à la reconnaissance des paroles prononcées par le locuteur. Les données vocales comprennent les données de texte ainsi que des valeurs de confiance indiquant la précision de la reconnaissance. Les données vocales provenant de chaque session d'apprentissage sont analysées afin de déterminer le niveau global des performances de l'utilisateur.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ASSISTING LANGUAGE LEARNING
SYSTÈME ET PROCÉDÉ FACILITANT L'APPRENTISSAGE DES LANGUES

The text data may a recognition of what the user spoke. The speech data may comprise the text data, and confidence values that are an indication of an accuracy of the recognition. The speech data from each language learning session may be analyzed to determine an overall performance level of the user.

Des données vocales provenant du fonctionnement d'une application de reconnaissance vocale sont enregistrées au cours d'une ou de plusieurs sessions d'apprentissage des langues. L'application de reconnaissance vocale fonctionne, pendant chacune desdites sessions, lorsqu'un locuteur parle, et produit des données de texte. Les données de texte correspondent à la reconnaissance des paroles prononcées par le locuteur. Les données vocales comprennent les données de texte ainsi que des valeurs de confiance indiquant la précision de la reconnaissance. Les données vocales provenant de chaque session d'apprentissage sont analysées afin de déterminer le niveau global des performances de l'utilisateur.
